about_the_game:
Need a little bit of seasonal chill? Snow Country brings in a full tileset with village, cave, and wilderness tiles! Build up pure ice walls and top them with a variety of snowy caps. Construct a winter town. It even includes a lighthouse (with animation) and igloo. Lookin' cool.

The Snow Country tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

icy water with and without ground edges
frozen ground, ice and pale ice (with snow edges)
stone and path tiles (with snow edges)
grass sprigs
snowy rocks
fence
and more!

Wall tiles:

blue stucco wall tiles (with and without wood trim)
shingle roof tiles (with shadow side)
rock wall
icy crystal wall
stacked stone wall
shiny cobble wall
two ice chunk walls
black stone wall
plain wall
most walls include multiple variations of iciness!

Also includes:

wall diagonals and lots of icy building components (ice pillar, chunks, arch, etc)
village (tudor detailing, windows benches, roof components, staircases, angled deck and walls, various accessories like a wagon and barrels, igloo interior and exterior, customizable railing and more)
lots of icy foliage and rocks, and Idyllic Village interior
oversized stairs, bridges, and lighthouse


Events and Animations:
Includes animated door and lighthouse beacon.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
